question: Q1.What is a django app?
Q2. Which architectural pattern does django follow?
Q3. What are migrations in django
Q4. Which of the following is a valid forloop attributes of Django Template System?
options: Django app is an extended package with base package is Django
Django app is a python package with its own components.
They are files saved in migrations directory.
They are created when you run makemigrations command.
Migrations are files where Django stores changes to your models.
